server.database

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.database.Database

  • public class Database
extends java.lang.Object
    this class is responsible for finding the database file, setting up the driver, and doing all the other database-managey stuff

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Database(java.lang.String url)
      constructs a new Database with a given db file
